Name: Knipex TwinGrip Slip Joint Pliers black atramentized, with multi-component grips 200 mm 82 02 200
Reviews: Not used properly as of yet. The little use it's had, it seems to be well built and of the usual high quality that knipex provide.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 February 2024

Name: Knipex TwinGrip Slip Joint Pliers black atramentized, with multi-component grips 200 mm 82 02 200
Reviews: I’ve used these pliers so many times in the past few days; they grip like crazy and have paid for themselves a few times over. I have no hesitation in recommending the design and manufacturer. A top quality tool that has gone straight into the grab bag for urgent tasks, rather than sitting in the toolbox.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 October 2023

Name: Knipex TwinGrip Slip Joint Pliers black atramentized, with multi-component grips 200 mm 82 02 200
Reviews: I wasn’t sure if I needed this, but are really quite pleased with it, the teeth combination are great and really grippy. The movement for size adjustment is nice also and easy to alter then the smooth jaw versions which are 3 times the price.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 October 2023

Name: Knipex TwinGrip Slip Joint Pliers black atramentized, with multi-component grips 200 mm 82 02 200
Reviews: The first time I saw one of my work colleagues with a pair of these I knew I had to have a pair, especially with the keen pricing of these. The quality is top notch as usual for Knipex. And these have come in very handy for those little tasks were the other usual Knipex pliers and wrenches just don't fit right. Super impressed with these.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 December 2023

Name: Knipex TwinGrip Slip Joint Pliers black atramentized, with multi-component grips 200 mm 82 02 200
Reviews: Knipex kit is always great quality and these pliers are no exception. I’ve been after a pliers you can use end on and these seemed to fit what I was after so I tried the non insulated ones and found them so useful that I bought the insulated version for electrical work.You won’t be disappointed, these pliers are in a different league to others both in build quality and design features.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 December 2023
